newsitem.title: USA: Intelligroup cancels offering, gets credit.
newsitem.headline: Intelligroup cancels offering, gets credit.

text.p: Intelligroup Inc said it cancelled its proposed offering of 1.35 million shares of common stock and that it secured a two-year $7.5 million revolving line of credit from PNC Bank.

The company said it cancelled the offering because market conditions did not favor it. The company said its current cash reserves are sufficient to support the company's near-term growth. It did not provide a cash figure and officials at the company were not immediately available to comment.
The company added that the credit line provides additional working capital.
The credit line includes, in addition to the $7.5 million, another $350,000 credit facility for equipment purchases, the company said.
